 SimpleString (StringData *)

Detailed Description

Storage and manipulation of character strings.

The character strings are duplicate only when they are modified. The copy are done only if necessary. (Use of a counter of reference on the character string)

By default, strings are equals to "".

Author:
Sebastien Pesnel

Dominique Vaufreydaz

Definition at line 35 of file SimpleString.h.
